title: Kenyan watchdog fails in police brutality probes
text:
Kenyan watchdog fails in police brutality probes 2:20pm GMT - 02:04 
There have been thousands of complaints about police brutality in Kenya in recent years. But few cases result in any legal action against the perpetrators, despite Western donors giving millions of dollars to help an independent watchdog to investigate. Maggie Fick reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
There have been thousands of complaints about police brutality in Kenya in recent years.
